Description_lang: Your spells and abilities have a chance to $?a137024[cause a Revival that heals for ${$297850s1*(1+($296326m2/100))}]?a137007[summon $296325m5 Army of the Dead ghouls for ${$296325m4/1000+$299368m2/1000} sec]?a137012[cause an immediate burst of Tranquility's healing effect]?a137031[cause an immediate burst of Divine Hymn's healing effect]?a137023[Invoke Niuzao, the Black Ox, for ${$m1+$296326m1}% of its base duration]?a137010[activate Incarnation: Guardian of Ursoc for ${$m1+$296326m1}% of its base duration][activate $@spelldesc297745 for ${$m1+$296326m1}% of its base duration].$?a137044[ This Demonic Tyrant only extends your other demons by ${$m2/1000}.1 sec.]?a137043[This Darkglare only extends your damage over time effects by ${$m3/1000}.1 sec.][]

description_blz.en_US: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Arcane Power for 35% of its base duration.
description_blz.es_MX: Tus hechizos y habilidades tienen la probabilidad de activar Poder arcano por un 35% de su duración básica.
description_blz.pt_BR: Seus feitiços e suas habilidades têm chance de ativar Poder Arcano por 35% da duração básica.
description_blz.de_DE: Eure Zauber und Fähigkeiten haben eine Chance, 'Arkane Kraft' für 35% der Grunddauer zu aktivieren.
description_blz.en_GB: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Arcane Power for 35% of its base duration.
description_blz.es_ES: Tus hechizos y facultades tienen una probabilidad de activar Poder Arcano durante un 35% de su duración base.
description_blz.fr_FR: Vos sorts et techniques ont une chance d’activer Pouvoir des Arcanes pendant 35% de sa durée de base.
description_blz.it_IT: Gli incantesimi e le abilità hanno una probabilità di attivare Potere Arcano per il 35% della sua durata base.
description_blz.ru_RU: Заклинания и способности могут активировать эффект ""Мощь тайной магии"" на 35% базового времени действия.
description_blz.ko_KR: 주문과 능력 사용 시 일정 확률로 신비의 마법 강화가 기본 지속시간의 35% 동안 활성화됩니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 你的法術和技能有一定機率啟動秘法強化，持續時間相當於基礎持續時間的35%
description_blz.zh_CN: 你的法术和技能有几率立即激活奥术强化，持续时间为正常情况的35%。
